name.baseName: Aluminum electrolysis carbon anode production ; carbon anode ; prebaked ; petroleum coke
铝电解碳阳极生产 ; 碳阳极 ; 预焙 ; 石油焦

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: The anode production system consists of coarse crushing workshop, calcining workshop, molding workshop, baking workshop and auxiliary workshop. The “cradle to gate” system boundary included raw material transportation, coarse crushing process, calcination process, calcining pollutant treatment process, vibration transport process, sieving and grinding process, mixing molding process, roasting process, roasting pollutant treatment process, defective products broken process.

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: The anode production system consists of coarse crushing workshop, calcining workshop, molding workshop, baking workshop and auxiliary workshop. The “cradle to gate” system boundary included raw material transportation, coarse crushing process, calcination process, calcining pollutant treatment process, vibration transport process, sieving and grinding process, mixing molding process, roasting process, roasting pollutant treatment process, defective products broken process.
technology.technologicalApplicability: This data represents the life cycle assessment of the prebaked carbon anode production process, primarily used in aluminum electrolysis. Prebaked anodes serve as a key component in aluminum smelters and are essential for the electrolytic reduction of alumina to aluminum metal. The process involves the use of petroleum coke, coal pitch, and other materials which undergo processes such as coarse crushing, calcining, molding, and baking to produce the anodes.
此数据代表预焙碳阳极生产过程的生命周期评估，主要用于铝电解。预焙阳极是铝冶炼炉中的关键组成部分，对于铝土矿电解还原为铝金属至关重要。该过程涉及使用石油焦、煤沥青等材料，并经历粗碎、焙烧、模old、烘焙等过程制造阳极。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataSelectionAndCombinationPrinciples: The petroleum coke and coal pitch were supplied by several suppliers, and the production data cannot be provided by prebaked anode companies. As a result, the petroleum coke and coal pitch data in the database were adopted in this study instead of specific production data. The data of caustic soda came from the literature, the data of petroleum coke, and the LCI data of electric power were drawn from the literature. In the prebaked anode production process, the supply of natural gas in the baking link came from the local natural gas pipeline in Jinan. According to the field investigation, the transportation distance of petroleum coke, pitch and metallurgical coke used in this study was 150 km, 120 km, and 200 km respectively. It is assumed in this study that the load capacity of each transport truck was 20 ton, the average power was 220 kWh, the main energy consumption in the transportation stage was fuel consumption, and the energy consumption per unit of road transportation was 1836 KJ/(t. km). The total consumption of diesel oil in the transport phase was 74.22 L. In this study, the average emission coefficient of unit fuel consumption was used as the standard for the exhaust emission of vehicles to transport the raw materials.

石油焦和煤沥青由多家供应商提供，预焙阳极公司无法提供生产数据。因此，本研究采用了数据库中的石油焦和煤沥青数据，而不是具体的生产数据。烧碱的数据来自文献，石油焦的数据和电力的 LCI 数据来自文献。在预焙阳极生产过程中，焙烧环节的天然气供应来自济南当地的天然气管道。根据实地调查，本研究使用的石油焦、沥青和冶金焦的运输距离分别为 150 公里、120 公里和 200 公里。本研究假设每辆运输车的载重量为 20 吨，平均功率为 220 千瓦时，运输阶段的主要能耗为燃油消耗，单位公路运输能耗为 1836 KJ/（吨/公里）。本研究以单位油耗的平均排放系数作为原材料运输车辆尾气排放的标准。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Tang, Y. et al. Environmental and economic impacts assessment of prebaked anode production process: A case study in Shandong Province, China. Journal of Cleaner Production 196, 1657–1668 (2018).
Tang, Y. et al. Environmental and economic impacts assessment of prebaked anode production process: A case study in Shandong Province, China. Journal of Cleaner Production 196, 1657–1668 (2018).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.samplingProcedure: A company in Jinan was selected as the research subject in this study. Currently, half of the world's prebaked anode products are produced in China. The production of the commercial prebaked anode in Shandong Province was 5.21 million tons in 2016, which accounts for 59% of the total production in China. As one of the large company in Shandong Province, the company chosen for case study can produce 400 thousand tons of prebaked anode annually. The production process is also typical for prebaked anode production in China.
dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: Users should note that this dataset is representative of the prebaked anode production from 'cradle to gate', including transportation of raw materials and all production phases up to the finished product, but excluding the use and disposal stages. As specific production data for petroleum coke and coal pitch are not provided by prebaked anode companies, the set adopts generic data. The transportation data for raw material is based on regional averages and the environmental impact of less significant elements not having major contributions is not considered. Users are advised to apply caution when extrapolating this data to different geographic or technological contexts and should account for regional variability in transportation, supply chains, and emission factors.
用户应注意，该数据集代表从‘摇篮到大门’的预焙阳极生产，包括原材料运输和所有生产阶段直到完成品，但不包括使用和处置阶段。由于预焙阳极公司未提供石油焦和煤沥青的具体生产数据，故采用了通用数据。原材料运输数据基于地区平均值，且未考虑对环境影响不大的其他要素。用户在将这些数据外推到不同地理或技术背景时应小心谨慎，应考虑运输、供应链和排放因子的地区变异性。

completeness.common:other: This study only took into account the long-distance transport process of petroleum coke, pitch, and metallurgical coke. Water came from the urban water supply system. Natural gas was drawn from the pipeline. Ammonia, sodium hydroxide and lime were purchased locally. The transportation distance of water, nature gas, ammonia, sodium hydroxide and lime is much shorter than that of petroleum coke, pitch, and metallurgical coke. The environmental impact of less than 1% can be ignored. Therefore, the transport process of these elements was not considered in this study. In addition, in the long-term production process, the environmental pollution derived from infrastructure development and facility construction was relatively low compared to that of 1ton prebaked anode, which was not taken into consideration.
本研究仅考虑了石油焦、沥青和冶金焦的长途运输过程。水来自城市供水系统。天然气来自管道。氨、氢氧化钠和石灰在当地购买。与石油焦、沥青和冶金焦相比，水、天然气、氨、氢氧化钠和石灰的运输距离要短得多。对环境的影响小于 1%，可以忽略不计。因此，本研究未考虑这些元素的运输过程。此外，在长期生产过程中，与 1 吨预焙阳极相比，基础设施开发和设施建设所产生的环境污染相对较低，因此未考虑在内。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: Calcium sulphate (by-product in Roasting pollutant treatment process)

exchange.generalComment: natural gas input in roasting process
